articles.title: Oil dips near 2-month lows as supply concerns ease - DAWN.com
articles.description: Analyst says weak Dec WTI contract expiration indicates paper market selling rather than true physical market softness.
articles.content:
Oil prices hovered near two-month lows on Monday as supply fears receded while concerns over China's fuel demand and rising interest rates weighed on prices.
